summary.body: Does anyone know when the next St Giles book sale is? I want to donate some books for them to sell.  I can't see anything about it on the St Giles website (although it does have some great photos of the history of the church).
summary.subject: St Giles Book-sale: when is the next one?

summary.body: Does anyone kow if there's a booksale at the Church this bank holiday ? I remember them being in August but not sure about May... ta
summary.subject: Book Sale at the Church??

summary.body: Someone once told me that you can get married at St Pauls if you are  a resident of the city. Is this true? Sounds a bit far fetched to me!
summary.subject: Weddings at St Pauls

summary.body: Does anyone on here attend this church as I would like to do so . Can anyone tell me the times of the services . It looks a lovely church and is close to where Im living . I attend church every week and want to continue doing so as a commited christian .
summary.subject: St Giles Church Cripplegate in the Barbican
